text: Given the manifest is parsed as via TOML as a `Dict{Base.UUID, Pkg.Types.PackageEntry}`, it doesn’t seem possible to add top-level metadata and be backwards compatible.. Unless the top level data is entered as comments, which seems hacky. Or is it ok for manifests to not be backwards compatible?
